name: Cricket Power-Play Lite
description:
Are you ready to step into the league of the most devastating batsman in the game?

Terrorize the bowlers with your big-hitting skills during the Power-Play overs, in this exciting, realistic and feature packed cricket game! Choice of teams, customizable and easy-to-play interface options, separate practice mode, global leaderboards and immersive graphics make Cricket Power-Play a must have game for every Cricket fan on the iOS.

Interface options - A choice of conventional control buttons as well as option to "swipe" your batting shots. These controls can be positioned on either side of the screen depending on your preference for a left-handed or right-handed layout.

Team flags - Choose your team and the opponents from a list of the top cricketing nations of the world

Practice Mode - Use the built in Net Practice mode to get the feel of correct timing and shot selection for each type of delivery that is bowled

Check out the game's support page using the link below, to get a better idea of how to use the batting controls.

This is the Lite version (ad-sponsored) of the Cricket Power-Play game with 5 overs of match-play and 3 wickets in hand. You can purchase the full version (with no ad popups) to enjoy additional features such as access to team-wise global high scores, cheerleaders, and 15 overs of match-play with 10 wickets in hand.
